cast.name: 潘妮拉·奥古斯特 Pernilla August

introduction: As the successful actor Ingrid (Pernilla August) arrives at her daughter’s (Aliette Opheim) 35th birthday party, her unexpected return is not as well received as she has hoped. Instead, her years as an absent mother come to the fore and the gap between mother and daughter are felt to be an abyss.源自：https://program.goteborgfilmfestival.se/en/program/surprise
